Parameterization ParameterizationAMDAS

Detailed Description

Parametrization of SlaterDet.

common fixed width for all single-particle states fixed spin

(c) 2003 Thomas Neff

void AMDASclone ( const Para *  q,
Para *  qp 
)

Definition at line 56 of file ParameterizationAMDAS.c.

References AMDASInternals::a, Para::A, AMDASInternals::chi, AMDASInternals::idx, Para::internals, Para::n, Para::N, Para::name, AMDASInternals::ng, Para::ngauss, Para::x, AMDASInternals::xi, and Para::Z.

{
  int i;

  strcpy(qp->name, q->name);
  qp->A = q->A; qp->Z = q->Z; qp->N = q->N;
  qp->n = q->n;

  qp->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));
  for (i=0; i<q->n; i++)
    qp->x[i] = q->x[i];

  qp->ngauss = q->ngauss;
  qp->internals = malloc(sizeof(AMDASInternals));
  AMDASInternals *qpint = qp->internals;
  AMDASInternals *qint = q->internals;

  qpint->a = qint->a;
  qpint->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
  for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
    qpint->ng[i] = qint->ng[i];
  qpint->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
  for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
    qpint->idx[i] = qint->idx[i];
  qpint->xi = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
  for (i=0; i<q->A; i++)
    qpint->xi[i] = qint->xi[i];
  qpint->chi = (int*) malloc(q->ngauss*sizeof(int));
  for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++)
    qpint->chi[i] = qint->chi[i];
}

void AMDASinitSlaterDet ( const Para *  q,
SlaterDet *  Q 
)

Definition at line 214 of file ParameterizationAMDAS.c.

References Para::A, SlaterDet::A, SlaterDet::G, AMDASInternals::idx, SlaterDet::idx, Para::internals, k, Para::N, SlaterDet::N, AMDASInternals::ng, SlaterDet::ng, Para::ngauss, SlaterDet::ngauss, AMDASInternals::xi, Gaussian::xi, Para::Z, and SlaterDet::Z.

{
  int k, ki;
  AMDASInternals* qint = q->internals;

  Q->A = q->A; Q->Z = q->Z; Q->N = q->N;
  Q->ngauss = q->ngauss;

  Q->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
  for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
    Q->idx[k] = qint->idx[k];

  Q->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
  for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
    Q->ng[k] = qint->ng[k];

  Q->G = (Gaussian*) malloc(q->ngauss*sizeof(Gaussian));
  for (k=0; k<q->A; k++) 
    for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++)
      Q->G[qint->idx[k]+ki].xi = qint->xi[k]; 
}

void AMDASprojectgradSlaterDet ( const Para *  q,
const gradSlaterDet *  dQ,
double *  dq 
)

Definition at line 253 of file ParameterizationAMDAS.c.

References gradGaussian::b, gradSlaterDet::gradval, NGAUSS, and Para::ngauss.

{
  int i;

  // only converting a complex in a real gradient

  for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
    dq[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
    dq[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[0]);
    dq[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
    dq[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[1]);
    dq[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = 2.0*creal(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
    dq[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = 2.0*cimag(dQ->gradval[i].b[2]);
  }
}

int AMDASread ( FILE *  fp,
Para *  q 
)

Definition at line 91 of file ParameterizationAMDAS.c.

References AMDASInternals::a, Para::A, BUFSIZE, AMDASInternals::chi, AMDASInternals::idx, Para::internals, k, Para::n, Para::N, Para::name, AMDASInternals::ng, NGAUSS, Para::ngauss, stripstr(), Para::x, AMDASInternals::xi, and Para::Z.

{
  char buf[BUFSIZE];
  int i;
  AMDASInternals* qint;
  
  qint = q->internals = (AMDASInternals*) malloc(sizeof(AMDASInternals));

  do
    fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
  while (strncmp(buf, "<Para ", 5) && !feof(fp));
  if (feof(fp)) {
    fprintf(stderr, "did't find <Para ...>\n");
    return -1;
  }
  
  char Pname[80], qname[80];

  sscanf(buf, "<Para %s %s>", Pname, qname);
  if (strcmp(Pname, "AMDAS")) {
    fprintf(stderr, "not a AMDAS parameter set\n");
    return -1;
  }
  strcpy(q->name, stripstr(qname, ">"));

  fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
  if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d", &q->A, &q->Z, &q->N) != 3) {
    fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
    return -1;
  }
  if (q->A != q->Z+q->N) {
    fprintf(stderr, "proton and neutron number don't sum up in line\n>>%s<<\n",
            stripstr(buf, "\n"));
    return -1;
  }
  fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
  if (sscanf(buf, "%d", &q->ngauss) != 1) {
    fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", stripstr(buf, "\n"));
    return -1;
  }

  qint->idx = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
  qint->ng = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
  qint->xi = (int*) malloc(q->A*sizeof(int));
  qint->chi = (int*) malloc(q->ngauss*sizeof(int));
  for (i=0; i<q->A; i++) {
    qint->idx[i] = 0;
    qint->ng[i] = 0;
    qint->xi[i] = 0;
  }
  for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++)
    qint->chi[i] = 0;
  
  q->n = q->ngauss*NGAUSS;
  q->x = (double*) malloc(q->n*sizeof(double));

  int k, xi, chi; 
  double a;
  double b0re, b0im, b1re, b1im, b2re, b2im; 

  fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
  if (sscanf(buf, "%lf", &a) != 1) {      
    fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
            stripstr(buf,"\n"));
    return -1;
  }
  qint->a = a;

  for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
    fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
    if (sscanf(buf, "%d %d %d "
               "(%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf) (%lf,%lf)", 
               &k, &xi, &chi,
               &b0re, &b0im, &b1re, &b1im, &b2re, &b2im) != 9) {
      fprintf(stderr, "malformed line\n>>%s<<\n", 
              stripstr(buf,"\n"));
      return -1;
    }
    qint->ng[k]++;
    qint->xi[k] = xi;
    qint->chi[i] = chi; 
    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] = b0re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1] = b0im;
    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] = b1re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3] = b1im;
    q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] = b2re;   q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5] = b2im;
  }     
  for (k=1; k<q->A; k++) 
    qint->idx[k] = qint->idx[k-1]+qint->ng[k-1];

  fgets(buf, BUFSIZE, fp);
  if (strncmp(buf, "</Para>", 7)) {
    fprintf(stderr, "didn't find </Para>\n");
    return -1;
  }

  return 0;
}

void AMDAStoSlaterDet ( const Para *  q,
SlaterDet *  Q 
)

Definition at line 237 of file ParameterizationAMDAS.c.

References AMDASInternals::a, Gaussian::a, Gaussian::b, AMDASInternals::chi, Gaussian::chi, SlaterDet::G, I, Para::internals, NGAUSS, Para::ngauss, and Para::x.

{
  int i;
  AMDASInternals* qint = q->internals;

  for (i=0; i<q->ngauss; i++) {
    Q->G[i].chi[0] = qint->chi[i] == +1 ? 1.0 : 0.0;
    Q->G[i].chi[1] = qint->chi[i] == -1 ? 1.0 : 0.0;
    Q->G[i].a      = qint->a;
    Q->G[i].b[0]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1];
    Q->G[i].b[1]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3];
    Q->G[i].b[2]   = q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4] + I* q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5];
  }
}

int AMDASwrite ( FILE *  fp,
const Para *  q 
)

Definition at line 189 of file ParameterizationAMDAS.c.

References AMDASInternals::a, Para::A, AMDASInternals::chi, AMDASInternals::idx, Para::internals, k, Para::N, Para::name, AMDASInternals::ng, NGAUSS, Para::ngauss, Para::x, AMDASInternals::xi, and Para::Z.

{
  int k, ki, i;
  AMDASInternals* qint = q->internals;

  fprintf(fp, "<Para AMDAS %s>\n", q->name);
  fprintf(fp, "%d %d %d\n", q->A, q->Z, q->N);
  fprintf(fp, "%d\n", q->ngauss);
  fprintf(fp, "%12.8f\n", qint->a);
  for (k=0; k<q->A; k++)
    for (ki=0; ki<qint->ng[k]; ki++) {
      i = qint->idx[k]+ki;
      fprintf(fp,
              "%2d  %+2d  %+2d  (%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)(%12.8f,%12.8f)\n",
              k, qint->xi[k], qint->chi[i],
              q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 0], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 1],
              q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 2], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 3],
              q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 4], q->x[i*NGAUSS+ 5]);
  }
  fprintf(fp, "</Para>\n");

  return 0;
}
